00001 /**
00002  *  @file idl.hpp
00003  *
00004  *  This class defines the macros and types used to implement
00005  *  an IDL interface.
00006  *
00007  */
00008 #ifndef _BOOST_IDL_HPP_
00009 #define _BOOST_IDL_HPP_
00010 #include <boost/preprocessor/list/for_each.hpp>
00011 #include <boost/preprocessor/seq/for_each.hpp>
00012 #include <boost/preprocessor/stringize.hpp>
00013 #include <boost/idl/get_typestring.hpp>
00014 #include <boost/any.hpp>
00015 #include <boost/idl/mirror_interface.hpp>

00017 namespace boost { namespace idl {
00018 
00019     template<typename VisitorType>
00020     struct visitor 
00021     {
00022         template<typename T>
00023         void start_visit( T& inter )
00024         {
00025             visit( inter, *((VisitorType*)this) );
00026         }
00027     };
00028 
00029     template<typename T>
00030     class set_delegate_visitor : public boost::idl::visitor<set_delegate_visitor<T> >
00031     {
00032         public:
00033            set_delegate_visitor( T* self = 0)
00034            :m_self(self){}
00035 
00036            template<typename InterfaceName, typename M>
00037            bool accept( M& m, const char* name )
00038            {
00039                 m.set_delegate( m_self, M::template get_member_on_type<T>() );
00040                 return true;
00041            }
00042        private:
00043            T* m_self;
00044     };
00045 
00046     template<typename T, typename InterfaceDelegate = boost::idl::mirror_interface>
00047     class any {};
00048 
00049 } } // namespace boost::idl
00050 
00051 #define PUBLIC_BASE( r, data, elem )   public boost::idl::any<elem,data>,
00052 #define BASE_INIT( r, data, elem )     elem<InterfaceDelegate>::__idl__init(data);
00053 //#define INIT_MEMBER( r, data, elem )   elem = boost::idl::make_delegate( v, &T::elem );
00054 #define INIT_MEMBER( r, data, elem )   elem.set_delegate( v, &T::elem );
00055 #define DEFINE_MEMBER( r, data, elem ) \
00056         struct BOOST_PP_CAT( __idl__, elem) : public InterfaceDelegate::template calculate_type<BOOST_TYPEOF(&idl_definition_class::elem)>::type  \
00057         {  \
00058             typedef typename InterfaceDelegate::template calculate_type<BOOST_TYPEOF(&idl_definition_class::elem)>::type base_type;  \
00059             using base_type::operator=;\
00060             template<typename Type, typename AssignType> \
00061             static void get_member_on_type( Type* t, AssignType& v ) {  v = t->elem; } \
00062             template<typename T> \
00063             static typename boost::idl::detail::member_from_signature<T,typename base_type::signature,base_type::is_const>::type get_member_on_type()\
00064                 { return &T::elem; }  \
00065         } elem;
00066 
00067 #define VISIT_BASE( r, data, elem ) any<elem,InterfaceDelegate>::__idl__visit(data);
00068 #define VISIT_MEMBER( r, data, elem ) t.template accept<data>( elem, BOOST_PP_STRINGIZE(elem) );
00069 
00070 #define BOOST_IDL_BASE BOOST_PP_NIL
00071 #define BOOST_IDL_INTERFACE( NAME, INHERITS, MEMBERS ) \
00072 namespace boost { namespace idl { \
00073 template<typename InterfaceDelegate > \
00074 class any<NAME,InterfaceDelegate> :BOOST_PP_LIST_FOR_EACH( PUBLIC_BASE, InterfaceDelegate, INHERITS )  virtual protected boost::any \
00075 { \
00076     public: \
00077         typedef NAME idl_definition_class; \
00078         any(){} \
00079         template<typename T> \
00080         any( T* v )  \
00081         :boost::any(v) \
00082         { \
00083             boost::idl::set_delegate_visitor<T> sd(v);\
00084             sd.start_visit(*this);\
00085         }\
00086         template<typename T> \
00087         any( boost::shared_ptr<T> v )  \
00088         :boost::any(v) \
00089         { \
00090             boost::idl::set_delegate_visitor<T> sd(v.get());\
00091             sd.start_visit(*this);\
00092         }\
00093         template<typename T> \
00094         any( T v )  \
00095         :boost::any(v) \
00096         { \
00097             boost::idl::set_delegate_visitor<T> sd(boost::any_cast<T>( (boost::any*)(this) ) ); \
00098             sd.start_visit(*this);\
00099         }\
00100         BOOST_PP_SEQ_FOR_EACH( DEFINE_MEMBER, NAME, MEMBERS ) \
00101         \
00102         template<typename T> \
00103         any& operator = ( T* v ) { \
00104             boost::any* a = this; \
00105             *a = v; \
00106             boost::idl::set_delegate_visitor<T> sd(v);\
00107             sd.start_visit(*this);\
00108             return *this; \
00109         } \
00110 \
00111         template<typename Vi> \
00112         friend inline void visit( any& i, Vi& v ) \
00113         { \
00114             i.__idl__visit(v); \
00115         } \
00116     protected: \
00117 \
00118         template<typename T> \
00119         void __idl__visit( T& t ) \
00120         { \
00121             BOOST_PP_LIST_FOR_EACH( VISIT_BASE, t, INHERITS ) \
00122             BOOST_PP_SEQ_FOR_EACH( VISIT_MEMBER, NAME, MEMBERS ) \
00123         } \
00124 }; \
00125 } } \
00126 BOOST_IDL_TYPESTRING(NAME)
